MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH10 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Falcon Avenue and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified a fault on the underground cable network on Falcon Avenue, our engineers and contractors are now continuing the safety checks on individual properties and expect all power to be restored by 9.00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:52pm on 24th February 2021.
